attributes.action: Sort out the lack of services all of us drivers are receiving from the DVLA
attributes.additional_details:
At the moment its strike after strike. There are a lot of drivers that are due medicals, waiting on the passports and documentation back, that have been waiting months and months.
Peoples jobs are on the line due to needing there licences. 
Peoples mental health are suffering 
People need there licences for medical reasons and rely heavily on this fact.
There needs to be an investigation in to DVLA and something needs to be done about the length of time we are having to wait!
attributes.background: Sort out the way the DVLA are treating all us drivers. Very unfair. People are losing there jobs, left without documentation. People rely heavily on needing a driving licence. This is people lives the DVLA are messing with. Peoples mental health etc are suffering. Come on people pets join forces!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the level of service being provided by the DVLA, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Inquiry into the DVLA’s performance during the Covid-19 pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586778

Allow driving tests to be temporarily replaced by instructor examinations: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576153

Prioritise cancelled driving test candidates for rebooking: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565349

Make driving theory tests available to take online: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570878
